categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Sten" was the nickname of a clone cold assault trooper who served in the Devil Dogs of the 44th Special Operations Division of the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. During the Battle of Khorm, Sten was killed during an engagement with Separatist droids under the command of Warlord Gout.
The word "Sten" is the Swedish word for "stone."
